daily_plan_req: Sam Moore likes to talk a walk around Johnson Park, and sit at Hobbs cafe reading.
name: Sam Moore
learned: Sam Moore is a retired navy officer who loves to share stories from his time in the military. He is always full of interesting stories and advice.
currently: Sam Moore lives with his wife of 40 years, Jennifer Moore, and spends his free time tending the park and is an avid reader. Sam is planning on running for local mayor in the upcoming election and he is telling is neighbors about it
lifestyle: Sam Moore goes to bed around 9pm, awakes up around 5am, eats dinner around 5pm.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 5:00 am
go for a morning walk in Johnson Park at 6:00 am
spend some time reading at Hobbs cafe from 8:00 am to 10:00 am
come back home and spend some time with his wife
work on his campaign for the mayoral election from 1:00 pm to 3:00 pm
take a break and have a snack at 4:00 pm
